snippet: Police officials said eight people were killed in the crash at the pub, the Clutha, where a ska band was performing about 10:30 p.m. Friday when the helicopter spun down onto the building.
abstract: Police helicopter crashes into crowded Glasgow pub, killing all three people aboard as well as five in building and injuring at least 30 others.

byline.original: By STEPHEN CASTLE and STEVEN ERLANGER

lead_paragraph: Police officials said eight people were killed in the crash at the pub, the Clutha, where a ska band was performing about 10:30 p.m. Friday when the helicopter spun down onto the building.

headline.main: Police Helicopter Crashes Into Crowded Glasgow Pub
headline.print_headline: Police Helicopter Crashes Into Crowded Glasgow Pub
